column2: Cooking time w/ ESN

column6:
Do you want to discover the secrets of the most renowned cuisine of the world? This is the perfect event for you! We’ll meet on Zoom in order to cook a delicious dish from Abruzzo, a region of central Italy.
It’s called "Pallotte cacio e ova", a kind of super tasty meatballs… but vegetarian!
Don’t worry, we’ll guide you throughout the entire preparation of the dish! And, of course, we’ll eat all together once the dinner will be ready.
column8:
